application.doc: Retrieving the current date and time settings

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the current date and time settings
method.doc: To retrieve the current date/time settings, issue a GET request to the date and time endpoint.

param.name: dateTime
param.doc: The current date and time, in the format "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"

param.name: timeZone
param.doc: The id of the timezone the appliance is operating in.

param.name: enableNtp
param.doc: The current date and time, in the format "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"

param.name: ntpServers
param.doc: An array of NTP server hostnames or IP addresses.

param.name: ntpVersion
param.doc: The version of the network time protocol which is to be used.

param.name: syncIntervalMinutes
param.doc: Administrator LMI session timeout, in minutes.

param.name: ntpServer
param.doc: The NTP server, as a hostname or IP address.

response.doc: An internal error occurred while retrieving the date and time configuration.
